name: @tnt/trick-n-treat

scripts.compile:remote: echo "compiling the Remote project is not available"
scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:remote && npm run compile:screen && npm run compile:server
scripts.start:all: npm run compile:all && npm run start:remote && npm run start:screen && npm run start:server
scripts.start: echo "Starting all projects is still a WIP" && npm run start:all

author: Aidan Arrowood & Daniel Xiao
description: This is a social digital board game inspired by Betrayal at House on the Hill where a group of friends explore a neighborhood looking for treats!
